alert.note: Alert for Gove; Sheridan; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 8:27PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Thomas, southwestern Sheridan and northwestern Gove Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 826 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Grinnell, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Grinnell around 835 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 79 and 92. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northwestern and west central Kansas.
